short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Continuously check ECI C-Vigil RO/ARO Level dashboard and perform an alarming activity when any new case come to the system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension continuously check ECI C-Vigil RO/ARO Level dashboard and perform an alarming activity when any new case come to the system. User can set the alarming property to on/off when needed by clicking extension icon. Extension also alarm you if any session logout happens.

To work this extension smoothly, make sure c-vigil tab is opened and continuously refreshing.
